text: Jiří Paďour (4 April 1943 - 11 December 2015) was a Czech Auxiliary Bishop in the Archdiocese of Prague from 1996 to 2001, and the Bishop of České Budějovice from 2002–2014. Pad'our was born in Vraclav, Czechoslovakia. On 1 March 2014, Pope Francis accepted Paďour's resignation for health reasons. Pad'our died in Prachatice, Czech Republic at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Czech people Category:Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Jiří Paďour
